name: Snail Always Trails!
description:
Snail Always Trails (Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam) Created by: Albus Grizzle Team

Ludum Dare 50 link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/snail-always-trails

Itch.io Page: https://albusgrizzle.itch.io/

Our game inspired by famous Immortal Snail Assassin hypothetical scenario.

As a player you try to avoid touching the snail while it chases you.
You can throw objects to slow down the snail but not every object may not work as you wanted.
The goal is avoid from snail as long as you can, every time you fail restart and try again for better score!

Note: We couldn't make it to the JAM deadline. But we are happy to finish our FIRST game ever and improved ourselves! So feel free to comment and give a feed back.

Resources:

Music = SD Sound Tracks - Chase
